short_summary: Telecommunication Technician and Private Branch Exchange Technologist for Satcom systems support, Radio Frequency (RF) systems troubleshooting, networks design, analysis of telecommunication systems, and other similar work.
description: Directorate Joint Communications and Information Systems (DJCIS) requires Telecommunication Technician: Level 1 and Level 2, and Private Branch Exchange (PBX) Technologist Level 2 with a background in satellite communications and sub-systems to provide support to CAF deployed/domiciled telecommunication equipment and services. These services include Radio Frequency (RF) systems troubleshooting, networks design, analysis of telecommunication systems, integration testing and evaluation of SATCOM systems and sub-systems, equipment installation and product support, as well as identifying, cataloguing and maintaining configuration control in the DND supply system of the military materiel used in the Assistant Deputy Minister/Information Management (ADM/IM) group.
duration_in_months: BETWEEN November 29th, 2021 and October 28th, 2022, or as determined by the contracting authority
full_summary:
Telecommunications Technician and Private Branch Exchange Technologist
Try to keep this to a concise and easy-to-underline summary of the tender
===========================

**External Id**: PW-22-01007507 **Reference Number**

**Contract Title**: Telecommunications Technician and Private Branch Exchange Technologist

**Government Organization**: Department of National Defence

**Location**: National Capital Region (NCR), Ottawa, Ontario

**Closing Date**: September 27, 2022, at 14:00:00

**Security Requirements**: Personnel and organization security screening (Common PS SRCL #20 applies)

**Supplier Eligibility**: Tier 2 TBIPS Supply Arrangement Holders EN578-170432 with resources in the categories of Telecommunication Technicians Level 1 and Level 2, and Private Branch Exchange (PBX) Technologists Level 2.

**Objective**: Directorate Joint Communications and Information Systems (DJCIS) seeks a Telecommunications Technician: Level 1 and Level 2, and Private Branch Exchange (PBX) Technologists Level 2, to provide support for deployed or domestic telecommunication equipment and services primarily require knowledge of satellite communications and sub-systems. Responsibilities include troubleshooting RF systems, network design, telecommunication systems analysis, SATCOM systems and sub-systems evaluation, and support of telecommunication products, and identify, classify and track configuration control of military materiel and other products within the DND supply system.

**Expected Deliverables**: Detailed Proposal outlining the terms of the contract including the categories of skills proposed for each telecommunication technician, the proposed approach for delivering the service, the sampling and evaluation process of satellite communications and sub-system in the work cited.

**Contact Information**: 
- Name: Francoeur-Massia, Diane 
- Email: Diane.francoeur-massia@forces.gc.ca
- Phone: 1-343-576-0738

**Attachments**: Please refer to Canada Buys: Solicitation W2369-22-P5OI/BClosing date of 27 September 2022 to download the following documents:
- Solicitation W2369-22-P5OI/B: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/19/ce9c1a235dc4904cbb6e47eb3ac85a49/w6369-22-p5oi_b_rfp_en_tbips.pdf
